seo: ZEIT Next.js,SSRF漏洞,代码问题漏洞,服务器端请求伪造,版本13.4至14.1.1之前
seo_en: ZEIT Next.js,SSRF vulnerability,code issue vulnerability,server-side request forgery,versions 13.4 to 14.1.1
summary: 检测ZEIT Next.js 13.4至14.1.1之前版本中的SSRF漏洞，该漏洞源于内置图像优化组件存在服务器端请求伪造问题。
summary_en: Detect SSRF vulnerability in ZEIT Next.js versions 13.4 to 14.1.1, caused by the server-side request forgery in the built-in image optimization component.
